
Aissistant
==========

Aissistant v0.1

Initialization prompt for persistent conversation vector database and personal profile in ChatGPT using Noteable plugin and aissistant module written by Marko T. Manninen (https://github.com/markomanninen/aissistant/) Â© 08/2023.

Installation
------------

You can install the package via pip:

    pip install aissistant

Usage
-----

Examples of usage can be found in the [Aissistant Notebook](https://github.com/markomanninen/aissistant/blob/main/QASC_JohnDoe/AissistantNotebook.ipynb).
